item.description:
Boston / Cambridge SEO Internet Marketing Networking Group

We invite local Boston seo, affiliate marketing and search engine marketing professionals in New England area to join us.

Location:

Robbins Library Arlington, MA

Agenda:

6:30pm to 7pm: Open Networking

Business Card Buffet: drop you card on the networking buffet

Food Sponsor

Cambridge Real Estate Listings

A 2nd time sponsor that served us some amazing gourmet goodies last time! Plus a local small business attendee that has taken our event suggestions and implemented them to really grow this sites traffic.

7pm to 7:30: 2 Min Elevator Pitch:

* Tell us about you and your business or website interest
* Any networking goal your trying to achieve out of this meeting?

7:30 - 8:00 Guest Speaker

Talk by
Brian Hawkins

Co-Organizer of Boston SEO meetup group
&
Internet Marketing Manager for Pingo.

Bio:

Brian Hawkins is a veteran in the search engine marketing industry. He brings great experience in creating strategic online marketing partnerships with fortune 1000 clients. Mr. Hawkins is the Internet Marketing Manager for Pingo.com & co-organizer of BostonSEO.org. He's worked at two leading SEO agencies before being a Dad. Follow him on twitter @BrianHawkins.

Topic: Building an Offshore Team & SEO Link Building

Will cover things like:

- How to build an offshore SEO link building team for less then $4 per hour
- How to train & assign strategic link building tasks
- Where to find reliable offshore talent directly or through freelance sites.
- Learn some solid creative hooks to use as "bait" to attract links
- Review email pitch letters that increase open rates & responses
- See actual successful examples of what works to earn authority links

Finally you'll at least walk away with 10 creative ways that you can gain quick authority SEO links for your website. Because links our the lifeblood of a sites search rankings.


8:45pm The End

We look forward to seeing you all at this informal Boston search engine round table discussion!


The Cambridge SEO MeetUp

----------------------------------
Guest Speaker's Wanted:

We've been working hard to find industry experts and to develop a formal agenda to keep it interesting for all those that attend at this new big meeting room.

Food Event Sponsors:

SEO Pro's, will work for food! Contact us about sponsoring the event with goodies and drinks in exchange for publicity.

group.name: The Cambridge Search Engine Optimization Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Internet Marketing SEO Networking Event
